item.title: Norfolk Mother's Day Signature Dinner Cruise
item.description: This Mother’s Day, create family memories that will be treasured forever with an amazing Mother's Day Signature Dinner Cruise on Elizabeth River. While onboard, treat the mom in your life to a special evening with our holiday buffet, classic cocktails, and Norfolk's most incredible views. Celebrate with dining and dancing from our climate-controlled interior, or soak in the picturesque backdrop from our outdoor decks. Our Signature cruises are perfect for all ages!

image.alt: Norfolk Mother's Day Signature Dinner Cruise

item.title: Electric Bike Rental Downtown Norfolk (self guided tour)
item.description: Most bike rentals set you off in a new city with no guidance at all for you to explore an unknown city alone. This Downtown Norfolk E-Bike Rental and Self-Guided History Tour provides you with directions to go on a self-guided tour of the downtown area so you can learn about its history and culture.

image.alt: Electric Bike Rental Downtown Norfolk (self guided tour)

item.title: Skip the Line: Virginia Living Museum Admission Ticket
item.description: Enjoy a day of family fun at the Virginia Living Museum during your visit to Williamsburg. Explore indoor and outdoor animal exhibits and see more than 250 species of wildlife native to Virginia, including bald eagles and endangered red wolves. Kid-friendly highlights include discovery centers, interactive hands-on exhibits, and an outdoor Dinosaur Discovery Trail with life-like dinosaurs, dig pits, and fossils.

image.alt: Skip the Line: Virginia Living Museum Admission Ticket

item.title: Norfolk Buffet Dinner Cruise
item.description:
Celebrate a special occasion, host a group event, or experience a unique date night. Great for parties of all sizes. A Signature Dinner Cruise gives you the chance to dine, dance, and play games in our lounge spaces as well as catch spectacular views of the mighty ships and submarines of the Navy's Atlantic Fleet from our skyline deck.
Includes 2.5-hour cruise along the Elizabeth River Delicious dinner buffet with freshly prepared entrees, salads, and desserts Spectacular views of the Navy's mighty Atlantic Fleet Onboard entertainment with DJ music, access to lounge spaces, and interactive games Unlimited coffee, hot tea, and iced tea

image.alt: Norfolk Buffet Dinner Cruise

item.title: Norfolk Buffet Brunch Cruise
item.description:
Whether you’re a local, new to the city, or just visiting, a brunch cruise is the perfect end to your weekend activity. You’ll love our delicious brunch menu and games on our skyline deck.
Includes 2-hour cruise along the Elizabeth River Delicious brunch buffet with freshly prepared breakfast, lunch and dessert dishes Spectacular views of the Navy's mighty Atlantic Fleet with engaging narration Onboard entertainment with DJ music, access to lounge spaces, and interactive games Unlimited coffee, hot tea, and iced tea Up to (3) mimosas* or soda/juice tickets per guest

image.alt: Norfolk Buffet Brunch Cruise

item.title: Scavenger Hunt in Newport News by Operation City Quest
item.description: Get your crew doing something unexpected with this fast-paced scavenger hunt. Your smartphone leading the way, you and your crew will explore Newport News, solving puzzles, finding objects, and completing wild challenges as you hunt from clue to clue. You’ll get to know the city’s nooks and crannies, lean on your remote host for hints, and rack up points to win it all.

image.alt: Scavenger Hunt in Newport News by Operation City Quest

item.title: Self-Guided Scavenger Hunt: Mystery of Norfolk
item.description: Uncover the mysteries and secrets of Norfolk as you embark on a scavenger hunt with your group. Walk around the city and learn new facts about the sights that you see. Discover landmarks and hidden gems while you answer trivia questions and solve challenges. This scavenger hunt is ideal for small groups who want to have fun or celebrate an occasion.

image.alt: Self-Guided Scavenger Hunt: Mystery of Norfolk

item.title: Adventurous Scavenger Hunt in Newport News by Zombie Scavengers
item.description: Zombie Scavengers takes you on an adventure in Newport News to survive the zombie apocalypse! Use our app and some strategy to find a list of items needed to survive, in any order you'd prefer, around the city. Find the survival items to get points and do fun zombie themed challenges for points as well. Contrive a plan to get your survival team the most points in order to survive the apocalypse! Your remote host will follow along virtually and provide support if you need it. Can you survive the apocalypse in Newport News?

image.alt: Adventurous Scavenger Hunt in Newport News by Zombie Scavengers

item.title: Nutty Norfolk Scavenger Hunt
item.description:
Our very unique, immersive adventures are the only ones of their kind. We, unlike other companies, provide your very own remote, interactive, live host to assist and encourage you along through your phone. We are an Austin, TX-based global custom event design company offering scavenger hunts and other events in 300+ cities in North America and beyond. Our specially hand-crafted adventures are equal parts tour, creative challenge, detective hunt, and social experiment!
Guests get to discover in an alternate reality our favorite hidden gems off the beaten trail and creatively interpret fun art, history, and culture clues - for points! They get to enjoy fame and glory while appearing on our website’s international leaderboard, no matter what their score. They get to essentially race other teams in other cities, even if they don’t have competitors who have signed up in their city that day. Get ready to discover unusual oddities, laugh out loud, and make the experience your own!

image.alt: Nutty Norfolk Scavenger Hunt

item.title: Full-Day Electric Bike Rental in Norfolk
item.description: Electric Bike Rentals An electric bike rental is the very best way to experience Norfolk Virginia and beyond! The nearby bike trails are safe and breathtakingly beautiful. Visitors always say it’s the most fun and memorable activity of their trip. And locals are surprised to find such an amazing experience right in their own backyard.

image.alt: Full-Day Electric Bike Rental in Norfolk

item.title: Norfolk 4th of July Buffet Dinner Cruise
item.description:
Our 4th of July Fireworks Signature Dinner Cruise on the Elizabeth River is an unforgettable way to celebrate the 4th of July and experience the city from the water. While onboard, you’ll enjoy chef-prepared menus, creative cocktails, beer, wine, and Norfolk's most incredible views from the water. This holiday, celebrate with distinctive service from our climate-controlled interior and open-air outdoor decks while you cruise past Norfolk landmarks. After dinner, watch sparks fly on the water and enjoy a spectacular fireworks display as they fly overhead, honoring the nation’s birthday.
Includes 2 ½ hour dinner cruise on the Elizabeth River Delicious buffet dinner with freshly prepared entrees, salads, and desserts Front-row seats for a stunning fireworks display Spectacular views of the city's architecture and local landmarks Live DJ entertainment Guaranteed table for your party size Unlimited coffee, hot tea, and iced tea

image.alt: Norfolk 4th of July Buffet Dinner Cruise

item.title: Mother's Day Signature Brunch Cruise Norfolk
item.description: This Mother’s Day, create family memories that will be treasured forever with an amazing Mother's Day Signature Brunch Cruise on the Elizabeth River. While onboard, treat the mom in your life to a special day with our holiday buffet, classic cocktails, and Norfolk's most incredible views. Celebrate with dining and dancing from our climate-controlled interior, or soak in the picturesque backdrop from our outdoor decks. Our Signature cruises are perfect for all ages!

image.alt: Mother's Day Signature Brunch Cruise Norfolk

item.title: Sip Your Way Through Norfolk
item.description: Drink your way through Norfolk with a Norfolk Brew Hop Pass, which will give you access to free drinks at either three or six local breweries (depending on which package you choose). This downloadable pass is valid for 60 days, so you don’t have to try to visit every stop all in one day.

image.alt: Sip Your Way Through Norfolk

item.title: Norfolk Father's Day Buffet Brunch Cruise
item.description:
Our Signature Norfolk Father’s Day Brunch Cruise is the perfect way to gather for an unforgettable celebration. Create memories with your family as you dine and dance on the Elizabeth River with magnificent skyline views for a casual afternoon out with the whole family. Norfolk’s spectacular views are even more impressive from the water while you enjoy a delicious, chef-prepared buffet. You’ll marvel at famed city landmarks, such as ships and submarines, from our cozy, climate-controlled interior, and open-air roof decks. We keep the spirits flowing with a fully stocked bar, games, and lively music from our DJ. Join us for a memorable, one-of-a-kind Father’s Day celebration.
Includes 2-hour brunch cruise on the Elizabeth River Delicious buffet brunch with freshly prepared entrees, salads, and desserts Unlimited mimosas (must be 21 or older with valid ID) Spectacular views of the city's architecture and local landmarks Live DJ entertainment

image.alt: Norfolk Father's Day Buffet Brunch Cruise

item.title: Scavenger Hunt in Norfolk by 3Quest Challenge
item.description: Get to know Norfolk, Virginia better while having fun on a private scavenger hunt activity. Access your list of challenges via an app on your own smartphone. Try to complete all three quests within two hours for a challenging experience, or take your time and see the sights along the way–you set the pace.

image.alt: Scavenger Hunt in Norfolk by 3Quest Challenge

item.title: Visit Norfolk's Perk Up Pass
item.description:
But first, coffee! Join VisitNorfolk as we highlight our local coffee shops throughout the city of Norfolk, VA!
You’ll enjoy exclusive access to discounts and rewards with every visit to participating coffee shops! They will perk your coffee while you enjoy the perks!

image.alt: Visit Norfolk's Perk Up Pass

item.title: Holiday Scavenger Hunt in Newport News by Holly Jolly Hunt
item.description: Celebrate the magic of the season this year with Holly Jolly Hunt. Holly Jolly Hunt is an app based scavenger hunt that you can play anywhere of your choosing. Explore the city and look for holiday related items, both traditional and not so traditional. Take a photo through the app to score points for your scavenger hunt team. Perform fun, holiday challenges that will bring laughter to your team. See your score on the leaderboard compared to other teams from all over. Holly Jolly Hunt is guaranteed to provide lasting holiday memories. Whether you play with friends, family, or even co-workers, Holly Jolly will put a smile on your face for the rest of the year!

image.alt: Holiday Scavenger Hunt in Newport News by Holly Jolly Hunt

item.title: Participate in a Fun Scavenger Hunt in Newport News by 3Quest Challenge
item.description: The Newport News 3Quest Challenge is a scavenger hunt done on an app where players will find objects (given in the form of riddles) and complete fun challenges for points. The items & challenges are separated into 3 quests. Complete quest 1, then quest 2, then quest 3 in order to finish the game! Set a time limit for yourself to see if you can do all 3 quests in 2 hours! You'll have a remote host who will chat with you during the game if you need anything! The objective is to see if you can complete all 3 quests! Come play 3Quest Challenge in Newport News today!

image.alt: Participate in a Fun Scavenger Hunt in Newport News by 3Quest Challenge

item.title: Limousine Transportation....Round Trip Pick-Up and Drop-Off Special.
item.description: While most limousine companies charge for waiting, this rental only bills for the time you are in transit. Whether you’re celebrating a special occasion or exploring the area, this pickup and drop-off special is a great way to ride in style. Book your limo for dinner, children’s events, excursions, and whatever other destination you’d like in the Norfolk area.

image.alt: Limousine Transportation....Round Trip Pick-Up and Drop-Off Special.

item.title: Norfolk City Scavenger Hunt Excursion by Wacky Walks
item.description: Use an app to explore Norfolk in this fun royal scavenger hunt! In Wacky Walks, you will compete in royal tournaments to determine a King or Queen throughout the game. The King/Queen will lead the team in finding items around the city and doing challenges for points. Take a photo of the item or completing the challenges through the app. The goal of the game is to keep your King/Queen title the longest and gain as many points as possible during your game. You can play for as long as you choose, in any area of the city you'd prefer. A remote host will be chatting with you throughout the game if you need help. Come play Wacky Walks in Norfolk today!

image.alt: Norfolk City Scavenger Hunt Excursion by Wacky Walks

item.title: Adventurous Scavenger Hunt in Norfolk by Operation City Quest
item.description: To play Operation City Quest in Norfolk , you'll use an app to gather points by completing exciting tasks and finding objects around the city in any order you choose. Use strategy to gain the most points on the app's leaderboard and beat out other teams. Our scavenger hunt has a remote host that will help throughout the game via chat. Let's get competing in Norfolk.

image.alt: Adventurous Scavenger Hunt in Norfolk by Operation City Quest

item.title: Norfolk Signature Lunch Cruise
item.description: Join us on our Norfolk Signature Lunch Cruise for amazing views of the mighty Atlantic Fleet while cruising along the Elizabeth River. Our lunch cruises are casual yet festive, ideal for the whole family or a nice office escape with friends! Dance along to our DJ entertainment, sip on cocktails from our full-bar selection, listen to our live narration, or enjoy interactive games on our skyline deck. This lunch cruise offers something for everyone! Including a 2-hour cruise along the Elizabeth River, a delicious lunch buffet with freshly prepared breakfast, lunch, and dessert dishes, spectacular views of the Navy's mighty Atlantic Fleet with engaging narration, onboard entertainment with DJ music, access to lounge spaces, and interactive games, and unlimited coffee, hot tea, and iced tea.

image.alt: Norfolk Signature Lunch Cruise
